meta.content: Lindale Independent School District servesover4,000 students on six campuses. We have a wonderful tradition of student success. Whether in the classroom, playing field,academic or fine arts competitions, Lindale Eagles always excel.
Lindale Schools | Lindale Independent School District | United States

Lindale Independent School District servesover4,000 students on six campuses. We have a wonderful tradition of student success. Whether in the classroom, playing field,academic or fine arts competitions, Lindale Eagles always excel.

span.span: Home of the 2017, 20185A UIL Academic State Champions
ECC 2020-2021 New Student Pre-Registration is Now Open at tinyurl.com/ECCregistration.

h6.span: Lindale ISD Placed on the College Boards 9th Annual AP District Honor Roll for Significant Gains in Student Access and Success.

wix-image.data-image-info: {"imageData":{"type":"Image","id":"dataItem-jrl1xuq0","metaData":{"pageId":"c1537","isPreset":false,"schemaVersion":"2.0","isHidden":false},"title":"","uri":"8f47a8_f05aebb2b757491f9249580315611531~mv2_d_1261_1264_s_2.png","description":"","width":1261,"height":1264,"alt":"GKC_Kindness Certified School District S","name":"GKC_Kindness Certified School District S","displayMode":"fill"},"containerId":"comp-jrl1xujk","displayMode":"fill"}

span.span: LINDALE ISD ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATION THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE. However, the current year's total tax rate of $1.36 is three cents lower than last year's tax rate of $1.39.

Lindale ISD is known as one of the finest school districts in Texas. Lindale Junior High School wasselected as one of the Bush Institute's first class of Middle School Matters schools. The campus has since been named a Showcase School for the middle school program.

Lindale servesover4,000 students on six campuses. We have a wonderful tradition of student success. Whether in the classroom, playing field,academic or fine arts competitions, Lindale Eagles always excel. This past year, our students won district championships in University Interscholastic League academics at the high school, junior high, and elementary level. Our
Lindale High Schoolalso won the overall 2017 and 2018 UIL Academic State Championship

Parents looking for a new school system, please come by, I would love to give you a tour of our fantastic campuses. We are very proud of our new facilities; renovated football stadium, newjunior high campus, classroom expansion at the high school and ECC, new baseball/softball complex and a new tennis facility.For those that have not seen these new facilities, I would be happy to give you a personal tour.
The2019-2020school year is going to be another banner year for Lindale ISD!
Please contact me if I can assist you in any way,

p.span: For any general inquiries, please fill in the following contact form:

h6.span: Mission Statement:The mission of the Lindale Independent School District, together with families and community members, is to empower and inspire students to be lifelong learners, leaders of tomorrow and responsible citizens while supporting the commonly recognized, traditional, moral values and ethics of the Lindale community.

span.span: 505 Pierce Street / P.O. Box 370, Lindale TX 75771

p.span: To contact the web administrator, please fill out the inquiry box above.
